Content: @Patrick Crypto Hello, BTC maker payment locktime is almost 48 hours, if the taker is gone and didn't send his payment MM2 will automatically refund after locktime expires, please wait. We will possibly reduce the locktimes for BTC swaps, but not too much since it might take few hours sometimes for BTC transaction to be confirmed.
